member.name: D3D12_TEX1D_ARRAY_RTV
member.summary: Describes the subresources from an array of 1D textures to use in a render-target view.

member.name: D3D12_TEX1D_ARRAY_RTV.MipSlice
member.summary: The index of the mipmap level to use mip slice.

member.name: D3D12_TEX1D_ARRAY_RTV.FirstArraySlice
member.summary: The index of the first texture to use in an array of textures.
